Summary Note:
Carlijn Bo Bakker and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 18 years, Carlijn Bo Bakker has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Carlijn Bo Bakker is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2001, Carlijn graduated from Maurick College Vught with a secondary school diploma.
Carlijn graduated from Utrecht University in 2007, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Carlijn Bo Bakker is a 41 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Carlijn Bo Bakker launched her career as a Research Scientist at MSD Animal Health, where she gained valuable experience from 2007 to 2012.
In 2012, she moved to Novartis Farma B.V. to work as a Clinical Trials Manager, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 200000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited a significant sum of 3770000 EUR from her father, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2009, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
